compliant.section: 本隱私權政策之規定乃規範本服務及本網站之使用，以及自您所取得之任何資料。
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: 我們保留隨時變更本隱私權政策之權利。
compliant.legal provisions: Right to be informed of changes to processing activities

non_compliant.section: 關於本隱私權政策之變更將自該變更公布於本網站時生效。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall provide information on the processing of personal data to the data subject in a concise, transparent, intelligible and easily accessible form, using clear and plain language.
non_compliant.amend: Instead of simply stating that changes will be effective upon posting, the policy should specify a reasonable timeframe for users to review the changes before they take effect. Additionally, it should mention that users will be notified of the changes through appropriate means, such as email or prominent notices on the website.
